copy_number_seg.SEG_ID AS segId, cancer_study.CANCER_STUDY_ID AS cancerStudyId, cancer_study.CANCER_STUDY_IDENTIFIER as cancerStudyIdentifier, genetic_profile.STABLE_ID as molecularProfileId, copy_number_seg.SAMPLE_ID AS sampleId, patient.STABLE_ID AS patientId, sample.STABLE_ID AS sampleStableId, copy_number_seg.CHR AS chr, copy_number_seg.START AS start, copy_number_seg.END AS end
, copy_number_seg.NUM_PROBES AS numProbes, copy_number_seg.SEGMENT_MEAN AS segmentMean

FROM copy_number_seg INNER JOIN sample ON copy_number_seg.SAMPLE_ID = sample.INTERNAL_ID INNER JOIN patient ON sample.PATIENT_ID = patient.INTERNAL_ID
INNER JOIN genetic_profile ON copy_number_seg.GENETIC_PROFILE_ID = genetic_profile.GENETIC_PROFILE_ID INNER JOIN cancer_study ON cancer_study.CANCER_STUDY_ID = genetic_profile.CANCER_STUDY_ID

SELECT
FROM copy_number_seg INNER JOIN sample ON copy_number_seg.SAMPLE_ID = sample.INTERNAL_ID INNER JOIN patient ON sample.PATIENT_ID = patient.INTERNAL_ID INNER JOIN genetic_profile ON copy_number_seg.GENETIC_PROFILE_ID = genetic_profile.GENETIC_PROFILE_ID INNER JOIN cancer_study on cancer_study.CANCER_STUDY_ID = genetic_profile.CANCER_STUDY_ID WHERE genetic_profile.STABLE_ID = #{molecularProfileId} AND copy_number_seg.SAMPLE_ID IN ( SELECT sample_list_list.SAMPLE_ID FROM sample_list_list INNER JOIN sample_list ON sample_list_list.LIST_ID = sample_list.LIST_ID WHERE sample_list.STABLE_ID = #{sampleListId} )
